name: fashion-case
short_effect: Holds Pokémon Accessories for use in Contests.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A fancy case for the tidy and
organized storage of colorful Pokémon
Accessories.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A fancy case for the tidy and
organized storage of colorful Pokémon
Accessories.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A fancy case for the tidy arrangement
and storage of whimsical Pokémon
Accessories.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A lovely case to store colorful Props
for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.
